node.title: Victorian MP says his daughter was covering up anti-vaccination poster before being attacked
node.alt: Andy Meddick sits in an office space wearing a navy shirt and a rainbow lanyard.
node.description: A Victorian crossbench MP says his daughter has been profoundly traumatised after being attacked on a Melbourne street while spray painting over an anti-vaccination poster.
node.content:
["A Victorian crossbench MP says his daughter has been profoundly traumatised after being attacked on a Melbourne street while spray painting over an anti-vaccination poster.", "Animal Justice Party MP Andy Meddick, who has supported the Andrews government's pandemic bill, said his daughter Kielan went for a walk on Thursday night to clear their head after their family had endured violent threats over his political position.", "\"They had seen all of the hate speech, they had seen all of the terrible things that had been directed at me and the rest of our family during the last couple of weeks, they needed to get out and go for a walk,\" Mr Meddick told ABC Radio Melbourne.", "He said his daughter, who is an artist, often carries\u00a0chalk or spray paint around with them, and when they came across an \"anti-vax sign\" they were \"so incensed by that, they've decided to spray paint over it to cover it up\".", "He said at that point, a stranger approached Kielan and began \"yelling abuse\" and making aggressive\u00a0statements about politics.", "", "
Andy Meddick 'sets the record straight' on daughter's attack
", "\"Kielan became scared and started to walk away down the street,\" Mr Meddick said.", "\"This person followed, continuing to abuse her. Kielan started to run and the person chased her.", "\"Now any single person who is being chased and fears for their lives, if they've got something [the spray can] in their hands, they're going to throw it back which is exactly what Kielan did.", "Kielan then ran from the man and sought refuge at The 86 bar nearby, where staff locked the door and offered first aid for injuries which were later treated in hospital.", "\"I cannot thank the people in that bar enough, for taking them in and locking the door and looking after them,\" Mr Meddick said.", "", "
Mr Meddick says he is extremely grateful to the staff at The 86 bar on Smith Street who supported Kielan after the attack.(ABC News: Dylan Anderson)
", "The MP\u00a0said he wanted to speak out about the attack after a brief Victoria Police statement noted the incident began with a 25-year-old woman throwing a spray can towards a man with whom she was arguing around 11pm Thursday.", "Mr Meddick said any suggestion that his daughter \"somehow instigated this altercation\" was \"patently untrue\".", "He said it was possible Kielan, a trans person, had not shared all the information with police due to historically poor treatment of the trans community by police.", "Police are still investigating and asked anyone with information to contact Crime Stoppers.", "
MP moves away from claim attack may be linked to his support for pandemic bill
", "In an earlier statement, Mr Meddick said:\u00a0\"I have reason to believe that this could be linked to my role as an MP and the positions I have taken on the pandemic response.\"", "But he later told ABC Radio Melbourne while it was clear that that was the way it felt to Kielan, given the sustained threats and abuse the family had received, it was not possible to be sure.", "\"They were worried that that was the case \u2026 she was worried that she had been identified,\" he said.", "\"Whether that's actually happened or not, that's something that can only be determined if they catch the perpetrator and ask them.\"", "He said his daughter was physically OK\u00a0but emotionally \"absolutely distraught\" and the family were concerned about the impact the attack had had on their\u00a0mental health.", "
PM says behaviour is 'an attack on our very democracy'
", "Responding to the earlier characterisation of the attack,\u00a0Prime Minister Scott Morrison condemned the incident, taking to social media to say\u00a0it had \"no place in Australia\".", "\"This is not just an attack on an innocent person but an attack on our very democracy,\" he said in a tweet.\u00a0", "\"My thoughts \u2014 and those of all Australians \u2014 are with you Andy & your family.\"", "Debate over the state's proposed pandemic laws has\u00a0grown heated, with\u00a0Premier Daniel Andrews accusing the Prime Minister of\u00a0\"chasing the votes of extremists\" in\u00a0comments about the Melbourne protests.\u00a0", "Mr Morrison had condemned the violent, anti-government protests, while also suggesting he understood why the protesters were angry and resentful.", "Labor state leaders and the federal opposition joined in criticism of Mr Morrison, likening his behaviour to that of former US president\u00a0Donald Trump \u2014 a claim he rejected.", "Transport Infrastructure Minister Jacinta Allan said any attack on the family of an MP was \"just disgraceful\".", "\"My heart goes out to Andy and his family,\" she\u00a0told ABC Radio Melbourne.", "Opposition Leader Matthew Guy, who this week ordered his MPs to stop attending protests outside Parliament after\u00a0the violent threats escalated, also took to Twitter to say the behaviour should be \"condemned in the strongest possible terms\".", "\"To target an MP's family in this way is sickening,\" he said.", "
Retailers urge clarity as restrictions lift
", "Victoria has recorded\u00a01,273\u00a0new COVID-19 cases and eight\u00a0deaths as the state enters a new phase of the pandemic with fewer restrictions.", "There are now 13,813\u00a0active cases of the virus in Victoria, and 453\u00a0people have died during the state's current Delta outbreak.\u00a0", "With Victoria expected to reach its target to fully vaccinate at least 90 per cent of the population aged 12 years and over this weekend, most restrictions were\u00a0lifted last night.", "There are no longer density limits at hospitality venues, restrictions on\u00a0home visits have been removed, and masks are no longer required in most settings.", "Unvaccinated people will no longer be allowed into non-essential retail stores, including clothing, toy\u00a0and book shops, as well as\u00a0businesses such as\u00a0hairdressers, real estate inspections or\u00a0auctions.", "", "
Melburnians gather to view the Myer Christmas windows as they celebrate their new freedoms.(ABC News:\u00a0Eden Hynninen)
", "Fleur Brown from the Australian Retailers Association said retailers needed clarity over the roadmap with the festive season approaching, and asked for leniency over vaccine checks for customers.", "\"We think there's room for improvement when it comes to understanding the needs of retailers by the Victorian government,\" she said.", "\"This suggests a lack of empathy for what retailers have to go through with staff rosters and staff training in order to put this kind of protocol in place.\"", "", "
Hairdressers and non-essential retailers can no longer\u00a0accept unvaccinated customers.\u00a0(ABC News)
", "The Victorian opposition has also criticised new COVID-19 rules for retailers, with Shadow Small Business spokesman\u00a0David Southwick saying some traders couldn't afford to employ COVID marshals.", "\"To now ask these retailers to do all these additional things when it is make-or-break-it time for these small businesses is really unfair,\" Mr Southwick\u00a0said.", "There are 330\u00a0people in hospital with COVID-19, of whom 57\u00a0are in intensive care and 30\u00a0are on a ventilator.", "The health department said a further 58\u00a0people were in intensive care but their COVID-19 infections were no longer considered active.", "The new cases were detected from 73,020\u00a0test results received yesterday and have seen the state's seven-day average for daily cases rise for the first time in around a week, to 1,008.", "Burnet Institute modelling has predicted cases will rise over the next month to a peak around December or January that could put further strain on the health system.", "There were 5,842\u00a0doses of vaccine administered at state-run sites yesterday, and more vaccinations at GP clinics and other venues.", "Victoria has now fully vaccinated more than 88\u00a0per cent of its\u00a0population aged 12 and up.", "
Debate to resume on pandemic bill
", "The Andrews government has spent the night negotiating with crossbench MPs as it tries to secure another vote on its pandemic legislation.", "The pandemic bill was set to fail after former Minister Adem Somyurek revealed he would return to parliament to vote against it.", "Yesterday, the government adjourned debate as it tried to find more support.", "The ABC understands the government has had a number of constructive conversations with crossbench MPs as it scrambles to get that extra crucial vote needed for the bill to pass.", "Meanwhile, the Law Institute of Victoria's Tania Wolff said\u00a0more independent oversight and scrutiny of the powers was needed in the proposed legislation.", "\"There's been commentary from a whole range of legal bodies that one can't just label as fringe or extremist,\" she said.", "\"These are people who care deeply about society, but they're concerned about some aspects of this bill.\"", "Debate on the laws is expected to resume in the Upper House today.", "", "
COVID cases surging across several European countries
"]
